# init(coordinate:)

**Initializer**

Creates a point annotation at the specified coordinate on the map.

## Declaration

```swift
convenience init(coordinate: CLLocationCoordinate2D)
```

## Parameters

- **coordinate**: The coordinate containing the latitude and longitude values for the desired point.

## Creating a Point Annotation

- **init()**: Creates a map annotation that shows a title string at a point on a map.
- **init(coordinate:title:subtitle:)**: Creates a point annotation displaying a title and subtitle string at the specified coordinate on the map.
